DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the incidences of adverse events for patients with plaque psoriasis treated with Enbrel under usual care settings.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Enbrel (Etanercept) in Adult Patients With Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Proven diagnosis of Plaque Psoriasis Contraindications according to SmPC of Enbrel
